title: Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: silk, rayon, wool, paper, cardboard
Technique: printed and woven
description: Sample book with tan and white cover and red binding. Red printed label: "Olré Couture Fabrics, Inc." Contains 391 samples of both woven and printed fabrics. 41 wool, 11 wool and rayon; 26 silk and rayon; 104 rayon; 209 silk

tombstone.epitaph:
Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk, rayon, wool, paper, cardboard
Technique: printed and woven. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-3.
